title: Undersleeves, ca. 1860
description: Full undersleeves with band at top and narrow cuffs closing with two buttons and loops. Embroidery on undersleeves and cuffs in the design of lozenge shapes filled either with open flowers and dots ore with small squares in cutwork.

tombstone.epitaph:
Undersleeves, ca. 1860.
ca. 1860. Medium: linen, cotton
Technique: cutwork. Gift of Robert B. Noyes. 1940-81-37-a,b.
